value: This is the right time to invest in market esp. IT Sector,so go ahead and invest in Infosys.
Auto sector is performing good.You can invest in either Bajaj Auto or Tata motors
You can also buy SML isuzu.That stock has performed very well in last 1-2 months.
P/E ratio is one of the most important indicator to decide whether to buy that stock or now.
FDI in retail sector will generate lot of jobs and with the entry of big retail players there will be direct benefit to consumers and farmers.
And we will get lot of discounts too :)
In my opinion IT is the most important and attractive sector right now.You can easily get 20% return in next year
Banking sector is also performing well.SBI,ICICI and YES banks are top bet
